attributes.action: Make the wearing of a helmet whilst cycling compulsory.
attributes.additional_details: To protect people from sustaining life threatening injuries or even death. Prevent children from losing a parent and prevent parents from losing a child.
attributes.background: I would like the government and parliament to make the wearing of a helmet compulsory when out cycling. I still see too many people cycling without a helmet. Adults put helmets on children but don’t wear one themselves? It’s not only ridiculous but completely irresponsible.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315987
